notes: These are the only creatures known to have an area spell that deals different damage depending on the target's distance from the center of the attack, its Energy Ball attack. The target at the center of the spell always receives 500 base damage, those right adjacent to the target receive 225% of that (1125 base damage) and those at the edge of the spell receive 337,5% damage (1687).

name: Cursed Prospector
bestiarytext: Long deceased miners, cursed to roam the hollows of drifts and mines. Some of them humble and diligent in life, others greedy and ungrateful until death and beyond. They are ghost-like creatures with devious attacks and tend to call for the aid of other ghosts when in distress.
strategy: Prospectors aren't worth killing for experience or loot, but some players may want to kill them for their bestiary. In those cases, you must be extremely careful with their energy ball attacks which can deal massive combos to players near the attack's target, as described above.
